sn1.35:6.2: yathābālaṃ yathāmūḷhaṃ yathāakusalaṃ → yathābālā yathāmūḷhā yathāakusalā (sya-all, km, pts-vp-pli1ed, pts-vp-pli2ed)
sn1.35:8.2: nocidhāpagataṃ → nocīdha apahataṃ (sya-all, km); nocīdhāpagataṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed); no cidhāpagataṃ (pts-vp-pli2ed); nocidhāpakataṃ (?)
